QuestData.Title: Darkcloud Grimtotem
QuestData.Description: There is no alternative: if you intend to win a battle, you must spill the enemy's blood. In this case, unfortunately, a lot of it.$B$BYou know what we have to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 20 Grimtotem Tauren at Darkcloud Pinnacle.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need to kill more of the Grimtotem, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: While the Earth Mother does not condone such violence, we had no choice. The Grimtotem have ignored Her teachings for too long and are reaping what they have sown.
